Frequently Asked Questions

Discover what KonMari™ can do for you

How much will a session cost?

Pricing is based on an hourly rate. We suggest a minimum of 3 hours per session to maximize your experience. Pricing packages available.


How long does the process take?

Each project will vary based on the amount of items and the person going through the process. The minimum suggestion is 3 hours per session.


What is the KonMari Method™?

The KonMari Method is about choosing joy. By going through the items in your house and taking the time to truly evaluate the life you want. By choosing to keep only the items that bring you joy and about finding joy in the items the service a purpose .


Does the entire family need to be a part of the decluttering process?

This is an individual journey since only the individual truly knows what brings them joy. The family can be there for an explanation of the process to better understand what will be going on.


Will I need to spend extra money on supplies?

This is dependent on the individual and what they have already. If the individual is looking for a updated and streamline look they might consider buying storage that has a more cohesive look or more efficient storage solutions.


I have children, how do I include them in the process?

It is suggested that children over the age of 4 years old take an active role in the tidying process of their possessions. This helps children with their sense of responsibility and ownership of their belongings. @mariekondo’s first illustrated children’s book, “Kiki & Jax,” is now available wherever books are sold!
